channel.title: BUscience
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUscience, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 5 areas where NSF funding is enhancing undergraduate STEM participation at Hispanic-serving institutions

item.title: Scientists design new drug to fight malaria
item.description: A team has designed a new drug against malaria and identified its mechanism of action.

item.title: How are pronouns processed in the memory-region of our brain?
item.description: A new study shows how individual brain cells in the hippocampus respond to pronouns. 'This may help us unravel how we remember what we read.'
